trans-unit.resname: C20·9 | Kalamax, the Stormsire | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast your first instant spell each turn, if CARDNAME is tapped, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放每回合中你的第一个瞬间咒语时，若CARDNAME已横置，则复制该咒语。你可以为该复制品选择新的目标。
trans-unit.note: 中文数据来自SPG（2023-11-17）；非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；

trans-unit.resname: C20·9 | Kalamax, the Stormsire | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever you copy an instant spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Kalamax.
trans-unit.target: 每当你复制瞬间咒语时，在卡勒麦上放置一个+1/+1指示物。
trans-unit.note: 中文数据来自SPG（2023-11-17）；非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；

trans-unit.resname: C20·18 | Xyris, the Writhing Storm | Card Name
C20·18 | Xyris, the Writhing Storm | Card Text | Paragraph 1
C20·18 | Xyris, the Writhing Storm | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever an opponent draws a card except the first one they draw in each of their draw steps, create a 1/1 green Snake creature token.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一对手抓一张牌，且不是其于自己的每个抓牌步骤中所抓的第一张牌时，你派出一个1/1绿色的蛇衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: C20·18 | Xyris, the Writhing Storm | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, you and that player each draw that many cards.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，你和该牌手各抓等量的牌。

trans-unit.resname: C20·19 | Yannik, Scavenging Sentinel | Card Name
trans-unit.note: 非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；

trans-unit.resname: C20·20 | Zaxara, the Exemplary | Card Name
C20·20 | Zaxara, the Exemplary | Card Text | Paragraph 1
C20·20 | Zaxara, the Exemplary | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add two mana of any one color.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加两点任意颜色的单色法术力。

trans-unit.resname: C20·20 | Zaxara, the Exemplary | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a spell with {X} in its mana cost, create a 0/0 green Hydra creature token, then put X +1/+1 counters on it.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放法术力费用中包含{X}的咒语时，派出一个0/0绿色多头龙衍生生物，然后在其上放置X个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: C20·21 | Cryptic Trilobite | Card Name
trans-unit.note: 非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；

trans-unit.resname: C20·22 | Avenging Huntbonder | Card Name
C20·22 | Avenging Huntbonder | Card Text | Paragraph 1
C20·22 | Avenging Huntbonder | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, put a double strike counter on another target attacking creature.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，在另一个目标进行攻击的生物上放置一个连击指示物。

trans-unit.resname: C20·23 | Call the Coppercoats | Card Name
C20·23 | Call the Coppercoats | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Strive — This spell costs {1}{W} more to cast for each target beyond the first.
trans-unit.target: 积力～此咒语在第一个目标之外每有一个目标，便增加{1}{W}来施放。

trans-unit.resname: C20·23 | Call the Coppercoats | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Choose any number of target opponents. Create X 1/1 white Human Soldier creature tokens, where X is the number of creatures those opponents control.
trans-unit.target: 选择任意数量的目标对手。派出X个1/1白色人类／士兵衍生生物，X为由这些对手操控的生物数量。

trans-unit.resname: C20·24 | Cartographer's Hawk | Card Name
C20·24 | Cartographer's Hawk | Card Text | Paragraph 1
C20·24 | Cartographer's Hawk | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player who controls more lands than you, return it to its owner's hand. If you do, you may search your library for a Plains card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME对任一操控之地比你多的牌手造成战斗伤害时，将它移回其拥有者手上。若你如此作，则你可以从你牌库中搜寻一张平原牌，将之横置放进战场，然后洗牌。

C20·26 | Flawless Maneuver | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If you control a commander, you may cast this spell without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 如果你操控指挥官，则你可以施放此咒语，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: C20·26 | Flawless Maneuver | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的生物获得不灭异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: C20·28 | Martial Impetus | Card Name
C20·28 | Martial Impetus | Card Text | Paragraph 1
C20·28 | Martial Impetus | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and is goaded. (It attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)
trans-unit.target: 所结附的生物得+1/+1且已煽惑。（它每次战斗若能攻击，则必须攻击，且若能攻击除你以外的牌手，则必须如此作。）

trans-unit.resname: C20·28 | Martial Impetus | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever enchanted creature attacks, each other creature that's attacking one of your opponents gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当所结附的生物攻击时，每个正向你的任一对手进行攻击之其他生物各得+1/+1直到回合结束。

C20·49 | Agitator Ant | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, each player may put two +1/+1 counters on a creature they control. Goad each creature that had counters put on it this way. (Until your next turn, those creatures attack each combat if able and attack a player other than you if able.)
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，每位牌手各可以在一个由其操控的生物上放置两个+1/+1指示物。煽惑每个上面以此法放置了指示物的生物。（直到你的下一个回合，那些生物每次战斗若能攻击，则必须攻击，且若能攻击除你以外的牌手，则必须如此作。）

C20·52 | Frontier Warmonger | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.resname: C20·54 | Molten Echoes | Card Name
C20·54 | Molten Echoes | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
trans-unit.target: 于CARDNAME进战场时，选择一种生物类别。

trans-unit.resname: C20·54 | Molten Echoes | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever a nontoken creature of the chosen type enters the battlefield under your control, create a token that's a copy of that creature. That token gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个非衍生物的该类别生物在你的操控下进战场时，派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为该生物的复制品。该衍生物获得敏捷异能。在下一个结束步骤开始时，将它放逐。

C20·62 | Predatory Impetus | Card Text | Paragraph 1
C20·62 | Predatory Impetus | Card Text | Paragraph 2

C20·70 | Twinning Staff | Card Text | Paragraph 1

C20·71 | Nesting Grounds | Card Text | Paragraph 1
C20·71 | Nesting Grounds | Card Text | Paragraph 2
